title: Jake Gyllenhaal, 38, enjoys romantic night out in New York with girlfriend Jeanne Cadieu, 23
text:
They have been dating for about a year now, but have opted to keep a low public profile.

But on Thursday, Jake Gyllenhaal and French model Jeanne Cadieu were spotted on a casual date night while out on the town in New York City.

The couple were all smiles when they stopped on the sidewalk to chat with some friends, before heading off down the street, talking and laughing with each other.

Rare sighting: Jake Gyllenhaal and French model Jeanne Cadieu were spotted on a casual date night while out on the town in New York City on Thursday

The Brokeback Mountain star, 38, looked casual in a light green button-down shirt and dark jeans.

He also donned a pair of white sneakers and his brown hair was grown out a little more than normal and pushed off his face with a right part.

Normally decked out in high-fashion ensembles, Cadieu, 23, also kept it casual in cuffed blue denim jeans and a black sweater.

She also wore a colorful sneakers, a light scarf, and styled her brown tresses long and pushed back off her face.

Easy: The couple, who've been dating since late 2018, kept it casual in the fashion department

During their time on the street, the couple both offered sweet touches to each other's hand and back.

The two were first linked last December, and in more recent months they have reportedly been 'getting serious' with their relationship, according to Harper's Bazaar.

The couple have tried to keep their romance out of the spotlight, opting to not be photographed together at any red carpet events until this past summer.

Sweet chemistry: During their time on the street, the couple both offered sweet touches to each other's hand and back

She did accompany the star to his premiere of his latest movie Spider-Man: Far From Home back in June as well as an event for Cartier in Paris back in April, but avoided any extra attention in front of the sea of photographers.

Cadieu was born and raised in Paris, France, but now lives predominantly in New York City, due to her modeling career.

Gyllenhaal has had his fair share of high-profile romances that has included stars Kirsten Dunst, Reese Witherspoon, Natalie Portman, Taylor Swift and Alyssa Miller.
description: Jake Gyllenhaal, 38, and French model Jeanne Cadieu, 23, were all smiles during a casual date night in New York City on Thursday.
